1.text: Tends to stay up late at night. May randomly lose energy due to lack of sleep.

2.text: 'I'm sure taking a break today is fine...' May not show up for training.

3.text: Worries about her complexion. Mood may drop randomly.

4.text: Ate too much and put on some weight. Speed cannot be raised through training.

5.text: Feels a little melancholic due to migraine. Mood can't be raised.

6.text: 'Whoops! Watch your step!' She's more likely to fail a training.

7.text: 'Such a fast learner!' Learning skills becomes easier.

8.text: 'Training together is fun!' She gets along better with training partners.

9.text: 'Outstanding! The academy is proud of you!' She's more popular with non-students.

10.text: 'Don't get careless when practicing.' She's less likely to fail training.

11.text: 'Let's be thorough about working towards a successful tomorrow.' She's less likely to fail training.

12.text: Exhausted both physically and mentally due to unknown reasons. She's more likely to fail training until autumn.

13.text: Physically and mentally in top form! She's less likely to fail training.

14.text: Gain strength by reuniting with your fans when you win in Sapporo or Hakodate.

15.text: Gain strength by reuniting with your fans when you win in Fukushima, Niigata, or Morioka.

16.text: Gain strength by reuniting with your fans when you win in Nakayama or Funabashi.

17.text: Gain strength by reuniting with your fans when you win in Kyoto or Hanshin.

18.text: Gain strength by reuniting with your fans when you win in Kokura.

19.text: 'I haven't been able to get into the flow yet...' May get tired after racing.

20.text: Can shine in objective races as long as not afflicted by the Bad Practice condition, but will build up fatigue in her legs if racing continuously.

21.text: Disturbed qi flow makes it easier for bad things to happen.

22.text: Gain strength by reuniting with your fans when you win in Kawasaki.

23.text: Head into the race for the final crown exuding the unmistakable determination of a true hero.

24.text: Your legs cannot yet withstand the strain of racing, so participating in races may lead to exhaustion.

25.text: Stay motivated through mental fortitude! Prevents Mood from lowering once, and will disappear once this effect is exhausted.

26.text: I'm kinda in the groove today! Prevents you from getting a bad condition once, and will disappear once this effect is exhausted.

100.text: Can carry out Friendship Training with Team Sirius and is immune to Insomnia as well as Lazy Habit.

101.text: Can carry out Friendship Training with The Throne's Assemblage and is immune to Insomnia and Lazy Habit.

102.text: Can carry out Friendship Training with Ancestors & Guides and is immune to Insomnia and Lazy Habit.

103.text: Can carry out Friendship Training with Carvers of History and is immune to Insomnia and Lazy Habit.
